sentences.sContent: I wonder if this letter is overweight.
sentences.sContent_eng: I wonder if this letter is overweight.
sentences.sCn: 我想知道这封信是否超重。

sentences.sContent: If your luggage is overweight, you'll have to pay extra.
sentences.sContent_eng: If your luggage is overweight, you'll have to pay extra.
sentences.sCn: 假如你的行李过重了， 你得付额外的运费。

sentences.sContent: Why are so many of us overweight?
sentences.sContent_eng: Why are so many of us overweight?
sentences.sCn: 为什么我们中的许多人会超重？

sentences.sContent: ...the advice to the overweight people has been that we simply need to eat less ad exercise more...

words.tran: 价值超出…；比…更重；使苦恼
